features.title: Lightweight & High Performance
features.description: Built with Bun runtime and modern web standards for exceptional speed and efficiency.

features.title: Infrastructure Agnostic
features.description: Run on traditional VPS with Docker or edge environments like Cloudflare Workers/D1.

features.title: Misskey API Compatible
features.description: Seamless migration for existing Misskey users with full API compatibility.

features.title: Multi-Database Support
features.description: Choose from PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQLite/D1 based on your needs.

features.title: Flexible Storage
features.description: Local filesystem or S3-compatible storage (AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO).

features.title: Modern UI
features.description: Built with Waku, React Aria Components, and Tailwind CSS v4 for a beautiful, accessible interface.
